Description: Details on the offers sent to customers during the 30-day period
type of offer: bogo (buy one, get one), discount, or informational
minimum dollar amount required to spend in order to be able to complete/redeem the offer
reward (in dollars) obtained by completing the offer
days a customer has to complete the offer once they have received it
list of marketing channels used to send the offer to customers
Date when the customer created their account (yyyymmdd)
Customer's estimated annual income, in USD
Data on customer activity, with records for transactions, offers received, offers viewed, and offers completed
Customer the event is associated with
Description of the event (transaction, offer received, offer viewed, or offer completed)
Dictionary of values associated with the event (amount for transactions, offer_id for offers received and viewed, and offer_id & reward for offers completed).
Hours passed in the 30-day period (starting at 0)
